items.sentence: Tom tried to hide the bruises on his right arm.
I don't understand your motives for doing that.
Tom was struck by lightning and died instantly.
A lot of people didn't like what we were doing.
I don't know why Tom doesn't come here anymore.
Tom and his family have moved into a new house.
At some point, we just need to make a decision.
All three of my sisters have married Canadians.
I'm one of the three guys who couldn't do that.
I suspect Tom wasn't the only one who did that.
